Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve frontend runtime errors and hydration issues

## Backend
- Started FastAPI server on port 8000
- API now accessible at http://localhost:8000
- Endpoints operational and responding correctly

## Frontend Fixes

### 1. API Connection Issues \(ECONNREFUSED\)
- Root cause: Backend API server wasn''t running
- Solution: Backend now running on localhost:8000
- vault.ts already had proper error handling \(try-catch with fallbacks\)

### 2. Date Hydration Error
- Issue: Server/client date format mismatch
  - Server: "1/27/2026, 9:55:05 AM"
  - Client: "27/01/2026, 09:55:05"
- Root cause: toLocaleString\(\) without locale specification
- Fixed in:
  - TaskBoard.tsx: Standardized to en-US with consistent format options
  - DraftsView.tsx: Standardized to en-US with consistent format options
- Format: MM/DD/YYYY, HH:MM AM/PM \(consistent across SSR and CSR\)

## Impact
- Frontend now loads without errors
- No more ECONNREFUSED errors
- No more React hydration mismatches
- Dates display consistently

## Testing
Run these in parallel:
Terminal 1: python -m uvicorn src.api_server:app --reload --port 8000
Terminal 2: cd frontend && npm run dev

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
